 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּצֹּרֶת‎</span> **noun feminine** ==dearth== (compare following), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנַת בּ‎</span> [[Jer.17.8|Jer 17:8]]. 

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּצָּרָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==dearth, destitution== (i.e. ***diminution***, compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>572</sup>; see also verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בצר‎</span> [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[Prov.14.28|Prov 14:28]] ***people reduced***) — ***dearth*** (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בצרת‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִתּוֺת בּ‎</span> [[Ps.9.10|Ps 9:10]]; [[Ps.10.1|Ps 10:1]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּצָּרוֺת‎</span> [[Jer.14.1|Jer 14:1]].
